net.derquinse.bocas
Class BocasValue

java.lang.Object
  net.derquinse.bocas.BocasValue
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputSupplier<InputStream>
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoadedBocasValue
@Beta
public abstract class BocasValue
extends Object
implements InputSupplier<InputStream>

A bocas value. A value may be loaded (either in the JVM heap or a direct buffer) or not.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez.

Method Detail

of

public static HeapBocasValue of(byte[] bytes)
Creates a new heap value.

Parameters:
bytes - Value payload. The provided byte array MUST NOT be modified after being handed to the value, as no defensive copy is performed.
Returns:
The created value.

of

public static BocasValue of(InputSupplier<? extends InputStream> payload,
                            Integer size)
Creates a new value with the provided payload.

Parameters:
payload - Value payload.
size - Payload size.
Returns:
The created value.
Throws:
BocasException - if unable to load the payload.

Returns:

Throws:

loaded

public static LoadedBocasValue loaded(InputSupplier<? extends InputStream> payload)
Creates a loaded value with the provided payload. Unless a direct value is provided, a heap value is returned.

Parameters:
payload - Value payload.
Returns:
The created value.
Throws:
BocasException - if unable to load the payload.

entryList

public static ImmutableList<Map.Entry<ByteString,LoadedBocasValue>> entryList(Iterable<? extends InputSupplier<? extends InputStream>> payloads)
Turn a collection of payloads into a list of entries. The iteration order of the list is the same as the input argument.

Throws:
BocasException - if unable to load any of the payloads.

getSize

public abstract Integer getSize()
Returns the payload size in bytes (if known).

toByteArray

public byte[] toByteArray()
                   throws IOException
Copies and returns the internal data.

Throws:
IOException

toLoaded

public LoadedBocasValue toLoaded()
Turns this value into a loaded one. Unless the value is a direct value, a heap one is returned.

Throws:
BocasException - if unable to load the payload.

toHeap

public HeapBocasValue toHeap()
Turns this value into a heap one.

Throws:
BocasException - if unable to load the payload.

toDirect

public DirectBocasValue toDirect()
Turns this value into a direct one.

Throws:
BocasException - if unable to load the payload.

toEntry

public Map.Entry<ByteString,LoadedBocasValue> toEntry()
Turns this value into a loaded entry.

Throws:
BocasException - if unable to load the payload.
